snippet.title: Escape from Mandrillia - itch.io Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Get it on https://germanban.itch.io/escape-from-mandrillia
Join the Discord! https://discord.gg/HPES5g8

Escape from Mandrillia is an asymmetrical VR vs PC game. One lone VR player tries to escape an underground facility while up to two PC players controlling giant monkeys try to stop him. Featuring match customization, the gameplay style can range from pure survival horror to boomer-shooter action.

While the game is local-only, it can be played online via use of Parsec.

After two years of development and one year of public playtesting, the game is at a point where I feel I can ask for money without dying of shame.

I didn't want to do any kind of "early access" release until I was sure the game was polished enough to feel like a full game by itself. Now that it does, I want to see if people like the game enough to grab it on itch, DRM free. If there is enough interest for the game, I'll keep working on it and expanding it until a possible Steam release.
